intro.title: Tanach FST - Allegory of the Jacob and Esav Story - Yonah Aviv
story: You are driving down the streets of what you think to be Las Vegas, and see a baseball bat on the ground. Subconciously, you realize you are in fact in Springfield. You are on the street, but you decide to park in the alley.

options.text: Get out of the car, but take the bat too

alley.title: Alley
story: You scan your surroundings. You see a stranger walking towards you. He says, "Hey, I'm looking for a place to lay low for a while." You look around the alley. You see a small shack, and say "First one their wins!" You race the man to the shack. YOU WON!. Inside the shack, you see a gun.

options.text: Pick up the gun and go back to street
Just go back to the street

street.title: Street
story: You walk back to the street where there is a bar. You hear a loud bang, and as you turn around, you see a chair fly out the window and hit your shoulder.

options.text: Get mad and go into bar to show them whos boss

bar.title: Gangster Bar
story: You walk into the bar. You see a biker gang and you stop to talk to them. They say, "Hey, we're looking for a place to hide."

options.text: Put your hand on your gun, and ask who threw the chair in a mean voice

bar_2.title: Bar
story: The biker gang splits up showing a midgit drinking beer, apparently the leader, currently snorting cocaine. You stop. You realize he is your brother who is dead to you.

options.text: Take your gun and shoot him, but not before saying "You and your midgit gang should have hid from me when you had the chance"
Take your bat and hit him in the face, "I'll let you survive this one, brother"
You back off and leave after saying "I forgive you"

die.title: You died
story: you die because revenge is bad for you
